State.des: You pick up a cream cake that's been partially eaten.

State.Name: Found
State.des: You find a classic deck of 52 playing cards, apparently a usual pastime for the victim.

State.Name: Found
State.des: An old corded telephone that still works.

Evidences.Evidence: <State Name="Found" des='A letter with the following text: "Give up on the tournament! You are not as strong as you were before. For the good of the club, leave your spot to someone younger. ' />

State.Name: Found
State.des: Traces of Digitalis found from the crime scene
